name: Super Funky Ball
description:
CONTROLS

  • WASD to Move
  • Space to Start the Game!

YOUR MISSION

  1. Collect Bananas!
  2. Get to the Goal Post!
  3. Don't Fall!
    1. (Don't let time run out, either)

ADDITIONAL WORDS

Created by Sam Liu, Matt Cutts, Brendy Marquardt, and Cindy Liu for a school project in Intermediate Game Development. It's a little...funky..but we're proud of it! Only things missing are the world tilt and a tasty Dole© sponsorship!
